name: jskos-rdf
description: PHP library to process JSKOS and RDF data

name: orcid-jskos
description: PHP wrapper to access ORCID in JSKOS format

description: PHP wrapper to access VIAF in JSKOS format

description: PHP wrapper to access BARTIC in JSKOS format

name: wikidata-taxonomy
description: command-line tool to extract taxonomies from Wikidata

name: ng-suggest
description: AngularJS module for Typeahead via OpenSearch Suggestions

name: cocoda-db
description: database backend to store and serve JSKOS

name: jskos-php-examples
description: Sample applications of jskos-php - e.g. wrappers of terminology services to JSKOS-API

name: cocoda-mappings
description: concordances, mappings and conversion scripts to create JSKOS mappings
